page.title: 11BALLYMENA LIBRARY
page.content: AS FAR BACK AS THE 1800'S 5.THE LIBRARY HAS TO KEEP UP WITH MODERN TRENDS OF TECHNOLOGY.JUST RECENTLY WE ACQUIRED A NEW COMPUTER.AT THE MINUTE WE ARE PROGRAMMING IT TO STORE SMALL SUPPLIES OF INFORMATION BUT IN THE FUTURE IT IS HOPE TO CHANGE THE WHOLE CATALOGUE SYSTEM FROM ITS PRESENT CARD FORM.IN THE NEW BUILDING THE BRANCH LIBRARY WILL BE THE PREDOMINATED SECTION AND HOPEFULLY THE LIBRARY WILL BE AN INVALUABLE SOURCE OF INFORMATION FOR ALL THE COMMUNITY AND NOT JUST THE READERS OF BALLYMENA.
